rules.description: Map CapsLock to ESC when tapped, and to Control when held
Safari/Chrome/Firefox - Focus on the address bar with CMD+O
Safari/Chrome/Firefox - Focus on the address bar with CTRL+O
Safari/Chrome/Firefox - Copy URL in the address bar with CTRL+Y
Safari/Chrome/Firefox - Accept suggestion & go to the url with CAPSLOCK+G
Map ⌥⌫ to Ctrl-W when in terminal
